title: [Medicine] Scientists at Trinity College Dublin (TCD) have discovered mutations associated with early onset dementia that may lead to better understanding of how Alzheimerâ€™s disease occurs. The study shows defective circulating white blood cells a key driver of neurodegeneration.

[Health] Study shows strong associations between depression, anxiety, insomnia, and bad dreams in patients with heart disease. Heart patients with weekly nightmares are 5 times more likely to feel depressed or anxious and more likely to have difficulty sleeping compared to those without frequent nightmares.
